text: @SecPompeo @WHO Sacramento confirmed coronavirus was in their county since January. Stolen blaming others for squandering 3 months while your boss held rallies and golfed. Regurgitating your boss's spit is servile and undignified. Build a spine. Otherwise you'd just be a huge lump of lard.
